text: Loka tumhala navya candravisayi vicaratata. Tumhi tyanna sanga ki he lokancya upasanecya vela ani hajacya avadhikarita ahe (eharamacya avastheta) ani gharancya magacya bajune tumace pravesa karane kahi nekice kama navhe. Kimbahuna neka kama (satkarma) tara te ahe je allahace bhaya rakhuna kele jave. Gharammadhye tyancya daravajyamadhuna pravesa karita ja, ani allahace bhaya balaguna raha. Yasathi ki tumhi saphala vhave
